en: Volatile Deals damage at the end of each turn. Damage dealt increases with total damage taken by the character.
Characters with Awakening cannot fall below 1 HP, but are defeated when the timer on the Awakening status runs out.
Gives 4 AP if used at the very start of battle. Attack power increases with AP gained.
Recall a tape after leaving the dungeon. No battle effect.
Increases power of air type moves.
Increases power of beast type moves.
Increases power of astral type moves.
Increases power of earth type moves.
Increases power of fire type moves.
Increases power of glass type moves.
Increases power of glitter type moves.
Increases power of ice type moves.
Increases power of lightning type moves.
Increases power of metal type moves.
Increases power of plant type moves.
Increases power of plastic type moves.
Increases power of poison type moves.
Increases power of water type moves.
Harness a powerful signal, but at a price...\nTape starts with Volatile status.
Removes negative status effects and applies healing steam to the target.\nClears negative effect of Ritual.
Gives an Awakening buff, which prevents the user from dropping below 1 HP. When the status expires, the user is defeated.
A sticker with Kuneko's face on it :3\nNo combat effect.
A sticker with Kuneko's face on it :3\nIt's faintly glowing and needs more power. No combat effect.
A sticker with Kuneko's face on it :3\nKuneko will be pleased to see it shining brightly. No combat effect.
Overwrites a tape in your party with a tape from storage. The overwritten tape will be lost.
It seems to be for some kind of show?
A ghostly key that seems to flicker and fade.\nIt looks like it could still open a lock.
Select a party tape to overwrite
{tape_to} will be overwritten by {tape_from}.\nDo you wish to continue?
It's an active shrine of power.\nMake an offering?
{tape} may be lost or changed by the shrine.\nDo you wish to continue?

Empower Kuneko's sticker with a blessing
Makes your fusion meter fill a bit when you land a critical hit
Makes your fusion meter fill a bit faster
Increases recording chance when your fusion meter is full
Makes your fusion meter fill a bit when you land a type-advantaged hit
Makes your fusion meter fill a bit when you win a battle
